scripts.build: cd packages/storybook-react-input-state && yarn build && cd ../react-component-library && yarn build && cd ../vue-component-library && yarn build
scripts.lint: concurrently "yarn --cwd packages/css-framework lint" "yarn --cwd packages/react-component-library lint" "yarn --cwd packages/storybook-react-input-state lint" "yarn --cwd packages/vue-component-library lint"
scripts.lint-staged: concurrently "yarn --cwd packages/css-framework lint-staged" "yarn --cwd packages/react-component-library lint-staged" "yarn --cwd packages/storybook-react-input-state lint-staged" "yarn --cwd packages/vue-component-library lint-staged"
scripts.test: concurrently "yarn --cwd packages/html-storybook test" "yarn --cwd packages/react-component-library test" "yarn --cwd packages/storybook-react-input-state test" "yarn --cwd packages/vue-component-library test"
